channel.title: Neopets Hide and Seek
channel.description:
Hey! Can someone make me a script that would just play hide and seek? This could get you Ultimate ammounts Of np, and i think it would be very easy to code. Here's the like, incase you need it.
[url=http://neopets.com/games/hidenseek.phtml]http://neopets.com/games/hidenseek.phtml[/url]
I only ask one thing. PLEASE INCLUDE SOME RANDOM MOVEMENTS. (it only takes a few minutes)
Thanks. Could you please e-mail me (or contact me on MSN) when it's done? thanks.
- [email]alexrafuse13@hotmail.com[/email]
EDIT- You can also just send me a PM. Thanks.[br][size=1]Posted at: December 07, 2006, 08:06:54 PM[/size][hr]bump[br][size=1]Posted at: December 13, 2006, 06:28:59 PM[/size][hr]bumpies. i NNED it buy tommorow.

item.dc:creator: @13om13e12 13om13e12
item.description:
@13om13e12 wrote:

you wont get ultimate np because there is a limit. at most maybe a fewk
